item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 21, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Query Apple's FindMy Network with Python (212 points | 101 comments)
3. Escaping Google's Manual Reputation Penalty and Resuming Business as Usual (114 points | 25 comments)

7. Is stuff online worth saving? (83 points | 92 comments)

10. How the Samuel Smith beer baron built Britain's strangest pub chain (27 points | 5 comments)
